description:
As Kaiba’s blimp speeds towards KaibaCorp Island for the final rounds of the Battle City Tournament, the ship is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noa and his henchmen – five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba’s past who are out for revenge!  With the power of cyberspace on Noah’s side, Yugi and friends are trapped inside a new and dangerous Duel Monsters game!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Michi Naru Chousensha: Kyodai Kidou Yousai Fujou!
Mysterious Challenger: Giant Moving Fortress Surfaces!
未知なる挑戦者 巨大機動要塞浮上!
